text:
@realDonaldTrump THE BIG LIE (he's rich)  Anyone care to guess how many times he's begged the banks for money over the past few years and now?  There's a reason why Ivanka is working with banks on SBA Covid-19 loans.

He can only swindle through COVID-19 funds to save his GRIFTER ORGANIZATION. https://t.co/3T22HC5XNU
